member.name: WICJpegIndexingOptions
member.summary: Specifies the options for indexing a JPEG image.

member.name: WICJpegIndexingOptions.WICJpegIndexingOptionsGenerateOnDemand
member.summary: Index generation is deferred until is called on the image.

member.name: WICJpegIndexingOptions.WICJpegIndexingOptionsGenerateOnLoad
member.summary: Index generation is performed when the when the image is initially loaded.

member.name: WICJpegIndexingOptions.WICJpegIndexingOptions_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. This value is not used.
